domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Sir, this is a no brainer and you shouldn't have to ask. Blue states usually pay more into the federal "pot" and ask for less. Red states pay less into the pot and take much more than they pay out of it. Blue states are getting the shaft.
https://t.co/fBQCKnjyBO
